author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Don’t worry, if the metal used is anything like that used on their cars, the barriers will be leaking from rust holes long before they are over-topped.

author: Phil
content: The idiots made the barriers to low! Water will spill-over the walls in no time.

author: Willy
content: There may be a day when these barriers are left in the upright position constantly. Tho this does nothing with the head ache of the sinking city.
